str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
And not, neither, nor. From ou and te; not too, i.e. Neither or nor; by analogy, not even.
And not, neither, nor. From ou and te; not too, i.e. Neither or nor; by analogy, not even.
From akron and probably a modified form of posthe; the prepuce; by implication, an uncircumcised state or person.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
Fresh, new, unused, novel. Of uncertain affinity; new
